block.p: American League CLEVELAND INDIANS--Sent 2B Marcos Scutaro to Milwaukee to complete a July 28 trade. CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Waived RHP Ken Hill. KANSAS CITY ROYALS--Released RHP Jerry Spradlin. Purchased the contract of LHP Scott Mullen from Omaha of the PCL. MINNESOTA TWINS--Activated C Chad Moeller from the 15-day disabled list. Sent C Danny Ardoin to Salt Lake of the PCL. TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Extended the working agreement with Syracuse of the International League through 2004.

National League METS--Purchased the contract of OF Timonial Perez from Norfolk of the International League. Optioned RHP Jerrod Riggan to Binghamton of the Eastern League. ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS--Purchased the contract of RHP Darren Holmes from Tucson of the PCL. Optioned RHP Geraldo Guzman to Tucson. CHICAGO CUBS--Sent OF Brant Brown to Iowa of the PCL. Purchased the contract of OF Ross Gload from Iowa. FLORIDA MARLINS--Named Doug Strange scouting supervisor for Georgia and North Florida. SAN DIEGO PADRES--Agreed to terms with OF Mewelde Moore.

National Basketball Association PORTLAND TRAIL BLAZERS--Traded F Brian Grant to Miami and G Gary Grant to Cleveland. Portland received F Shawn Kemp from Cleveland. Cleveland received F-C Chris Gatling, F Clarence Weatherspoon, an undisclosed first-round draft choice and cash from Miami.

National Football League GIANTS--Released CB Ramos McDonald. Signed CB Omar Stoutmire. JETS--Waived RB Vaughn Sanders from the practice squad. Signed RB Marlion Jackson to the practice squad. GREEN BAY PACKERS--Signed WR Gerald Williams to the practice squad. JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS--Placed DE Eric Curry on injured reserve. Signed DE David Richie. Signed DE Paul Spicer to the practice squad. Released OT John Blick from the practice squad. KANSAS CITY CHIEFS--Signed WR Desmond Kitchens, DT Norris McCleary, FB Chris Gall, TE Kirk McMullen, and WR Andy McCullough to the practice squad. MIAMI DOLPHINS--Signed FB-TE Ryan Neufeld and T Dan Palmer to the practice squad. NEW ENGLAND PATRIOTS--Released T Josh Rawlings. Signed T Sale Isaia. PHILADELPHIA EAGLES--Signed C-G John Romero to the practice squad. SEATTLE SEAHAWKS--Added QB Travis Brown, CB Tyrone Bell and LB Tim Terry to the practice squad. TENNESSEE TITANS--Signed CB Michael Booker. Waived G Aaron Koch.

National Hockey League CALGARY FLAMES--Agreed to terms with LW Jason Wiemer. CAROLINA HURRICANES--Named Doug Piper executive vice president of business operations. FLORIDA PANTHERS--Named Randy Sieminski media relations director.

MOUNTAIN WEST CONFERENCE--Named Bob Burda assistant commissioner for communications. CCNY--Announced the resignation of Dan Nigro, men's basketball coach. CORNELL--Named Eric McDowell director of athletic communications and Jennifer Johnson women's assistant lacrosse coach. Named Scott Urick men's part-time assistant lacrosse coach. DELAWARE--Named Melissa McLinden and Andrew Capone women's assistant volleyball coaches, Rachel Barger volunteer assistant field hockey coach, Christine DeLalio women's assistant rowing coach, Jessica Celi women's assistant soccer coach, and Eric Hymowitz men's and women's soccer goalkeeper coach. ST. FRANCIS, PA.--Named Joe Spagnola men's assistant soccer coach, Michael Coll women's assistant soccer coach and Martin Romeril women's field hockey and lacrosse coach. SETON HALL--Named Ron Farina men's and women's swimming and diving coach-aquatics coordinator. SUSQUEHANNA--Named Denny Bowers, John Bush and Casey Goff assistant football coaches and Sean Noonan men's and women's assistant soccer coach. UC IRVINE--Named Robert Smitheran director of compliance and Kelly Crawford women's golf coach. VASSAR--Named Michael Levin director of sports information.
